#
# Autogenerated from /export/home/dicuccio/cpp-cmake/cpp-toolkit-clean/src/dbapi/driver/ftds95/freetds/odbc/Makefile.odbc95.lib
#
add_library(odbc_ftds95
    odbc connectparams convert_tds2sql descriptor prepare_query odbc_util
    native sql2tds error odbc_checks sqlwchar odbc_data
)
include_directories(${FTDS95_INCLUDE} ${ODBC_INCLUDE})
add_definitions(-D_FREETDS_LIBRARY_SOURCE -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DSQL_NOUNICODEMAP)

target_link_libraries(odbc_ftds95
    tds_ftds95
)

if (APPLE)
   target_link_libraries(odbc_ftds95
    tds_ftds95
)
endif (APPLE)
